mutants.code:
def add_fractions(num1, den1, num2, den2):
    from math import gcd
    num = num1 * den2 - num2 * den1
    den = den1 * den2
    common_divisor = gcd(num, den)
    num_reduced = num // common_divisor
    den_reduced = den // common_divisor
    return (num_reduced, den_reduced)

def add_fractions(num1, den1, num2, den2):
    from math import gcd
    num = num1 * den2 * (num2 * den1)
    den = den1 * den2
    common_divisor = gcd(num, den)
    num_reduced = num // common_divisor
    den_reduced = den // common_divisor
    return (num_reduced, den_reduced)

def add_fractions(num1, den1, num2, den2):
    from math import gcd
    num = num1 * den2 + num2 * den1
    den = den1 / den2
    common_divisor = gcd(num, den)
    num_reduced = num // common_divisor
    den_reduced = den // common_divisor
    return (num_reduced, den_reduced)
